name: No ads on kisscartoon(not detected as adblocker)
description:
v1.0.0
Disable ads on Kisscartoon
(without triggering the "disable adblock" message)

KissAnime version:
https://userstyles.org/styles/131489/no-ads-on-kissanime-not-detected-as-adblocker
css:
@-moz-document url-prefix("http://kisscartoon"), url-prefix("https://kisscartoon") {
#adsIfrme1,
#adsIfrme2,
#adsIfrme3,
#adsIfrme4,
#adsIfrme5,
#adsIfrme6,
#adsIfrme7,
#adsIfrme8,
#adsIfrme9,
#adsIfrme10,
#adsIfrme11,
#adsIfrme1+.divCloseBut,
#adsIfrme2+.divCloseBut,
#adsIfrme3+.divCloseBut,
#adsIfrme4+.divCloseBut,
#adsIfrme5+.divCloseBut,
#adsIfrme6+.divCloseBut,
#adsIfrme7+.divCloseBut,
#adsIfrme8+.divCloseBut,
#adsIfrme9+.divCloseBut,
#adsIfrme10+.divCloseBut,
#adsIfrme11+.divCloseBut,
#divAds,
#divAds2,
div[style="position: absolute; top: 220px; left: 0px; z-index: 100; width: 100%; height: 768px; overflow: hidden; visibility: hidden;"],
div[style="position: absolute; left: 50%; margin-left: 500px; margin-right: 0px; visibility: visible;"],
#videoAd,
#videoAdClose{
    display:none!important
}

}
